com.stormpath.sdk.impl.ds

Interface InternalDataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDataStore

    public interface InternalDataStore
extends DataStore
    Internal DataStore used for implementation purposes only. Not intended to be called by SDK end users!

    WARNING: This API CAN CHANGE AT ANY TIME, WITHOUT NOTICE. DO NOT DEPEND ON IT.

    Since:
    0.2
